titleStmt.title: The Copy-holders plea against the excess of fines, uncertain exacted of them by their lords upon their admittance.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Cole in Leaden-Hall, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Printing-press in Cornhil neer the Royal Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copies: copy E.724[4]: "Decemb: 13:"; copy E.830[1]: "March: 10", "March 10", "1654", the 3 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the Printing-press in Cornhil neer the Royal Exchange.
